name: John Ratz
bio:
RATZ (black granite) Gordon Marcius
son of John & Barbara Ratz
died Oct. 18, 1908
ae 8 yrs. 4 mos. 17 ds.
Ida Ratz
wife of William Sweitzer
born Apr. 10, 1889-died Jan. 10, 1920
Gone but not forgotten
(back)John Ratz
born Apr. 18, 1853-died June 21, 1942
Barbara Finkbeiner
wife of John Ratz
born Feb. 16, 1856-died Jan. 6, 1924
in her 67th year.
Simon V. Ratz
born Nov. 26, 1883-died Feb. 28, 1947
